mapper.sql: select a.id as tb_betting_strategy_for_single_id,a.strategy,a.betting_amount,a.create_time,a.fk_betting_game_id,a.fk_company_id,a.service_id, b.id as tb_betting_game_id, b.league_id,b.league_name,b.away_name,b.home_name,b.game_date_time,b.home_score,b.away_score,b.league_time_id,b.league_time_name,b.round,b.home_score_half,b.away_score_half,b.let_the_count, c.id as tb_company_odds_id,c.fk_betting_game_id as betting_game_id,c.lose_odds,c.win_odds,c.handicap,c.handicap_name from tb_asian_handicap_betting_strategy as a left join tb_betting_game as b on a.fk_betting_game_id=b.id left join tb_company_odds_asian_handicap as c on c.company_id = a.fk_company_id and b.id=c.fk_betting_game_id
mapper.select:
select game_date_time,sum(1) as num from (
where b.game_date_time > #{beginTime} and b.game_date_time <= #{endTime} and a.service_id = #{serviceId} ) as aa group by game_date_time order by game_date_time

select b.id , b.league_id,b.league_name,b.away_name,b.home_name,b.game_date_time,b.home_score,b.away_score,b.league_time_id,b.league_time_name,b.round,b.home_score_half,b.away_score_half,b.let_the_count from tb_betting_game as b where b.id in ( select tb_betting_game_id from (
where b.game_date_time = #{gameDate} and a.service_id = #{serviceId} ) as aa )
select id,handicap, handicap_name, lose_odds,win_odds,fk_betting_game_id as betting_game_id from tb_company_odds_asian_handicap where fk_betting_game_id= #{betting_game_id}

select id,strategy,betting_amount,create_time,fk_betting_game_id,fk_company_id,service_id from tb_asian_handicap_betting_strategy s where s.fk_betting_game_id= #{betting_game_id} and s.service_id= #{serviceId}
